properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 30 at 12:47PM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service Office in Riverton.

* WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts around 50 mph.

* WHERE...Northern Johnson County including Buffalo and
Interstates 25 and 90.

* WHEN...Through 5 PM.

* IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. There could be control issues
especially for light and high profile vehicles, including campers
and tractor trailers.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some snow showers could cause roads to be
slick in spots. This in combination with the wind could result
in a slide off. If you encounter a snow shower, slow down and
leave plenty of room between you and the next vehicle.
